mapper.sql: a.id AS id, a.parentId AS parentId, a.parentIds AS parentIds, a.name AS name, a.english_name AS englishName, a.sort AS sort, a.city_id AS "city.id", a.type AS type, a.address AS address, a.status AS status, a.level AS level, a.phone AS phone, a.email AS email, a.manager AS "manager.id", a.fax AS fax, a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_time AS createTime, a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.updateTime AS updateTime, a.del_flag AS delFlag
